law.catch_line: The president of the county board is entitled to receive $7,500 annually as compensation and the oth...

text.section: The president of the county board is entitled to receive $7,500 annually as compensation and the other members are entitled to receive $6,500 each annually as compensation.
The compensation of the president and the members described in subsection (a) of this section shall be paid in four equal quarterly installments.
